Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label a fish and its habitat, showing where it lives.
The student can identify and illustrate the elements that a fish needs to survive, such as water and other living things in its environment.
The student can draw and label other living things in the same habitat, highlighting the relationship between them and the fish.

The student can represent the system of living things and their environment, showing how the fish and other organisms meet their needs.
